extracted_data_phrases: in matters related to their authority or will

disobedience.description: As per the fourth commandment, it's a child's duty to respond to parental love, wisdom, and respect with obedience.

extracted_data_phrases: with their personal weaknesses or shortcomings

disobedience.description: Rejecting Church unity due to frustration with individuals is sinful because it confuses the Church's divine nature and eternal truths with the human imperfections of its members, while also violating Christ's prayer "that they may all be one."

disobedience.description: This is considered sinful because deliberately disregarding prescribed days of fasting represents disobedience to Church authority and fails to honor our spiritual obligation to practice self-denial and penance during sacred times.

disobedience.question: Did I, through my words, mock the Church?
disobedience.description: Mocking the church shows contempt for Christ's established institution on earth, disrespects the Body of Christ, and undermines the Church's divine authority as guided by the Holy Spirit.

extracted_data_phrases: in words that disrespect their dignity as children of God

uncharity.description: Treating others with disrespect denies their inherent dignity as beings created in God's image and violates Christ's command to love one another as He has loved us.

uncharity.question: Do I disrespect others in my interactions and dealings?
uncharity.description: Treating others with disrespect denies their inherent dignity as beings created in God's image and violates Christ's command to love one another as He has loved us.

uncharity.question: Did I show disrespect to others when I lost my patience with them?

extracted_data_phrases: in situations where I had the ability to intervene and make a difference
uncharity.question:
Did I permit someone else to be treated unfairly?

uncharity.description: This sin violates the principles of justice, charity, and our moral obligation to defend human dignity and protect our neighbors from harm when we have the ability to intervene.

extracted_data_phrases: in any situation where you had the opportunity to act or intervene

extracted_data_phrases: in genuine need of my help
uncharity.question: Have I not neglected to assist those in genuine need of my help?

extracted_data_phrases: particularly to acquaintances , colleagues , or family members who are struggling financially , emotionally , or physically

extracted_data_phrases: particularly during times of crisis or need

lukewarmness.description: Lukewarmness in spiritual growth is sinful because one essentially chooses comfort and mediocrity over the transformative love God offers, which Jesus specifically warned against in Revelation 3:16.

gluttony.description: This sin of gluttony demonstrates an inordinate attachment to worldly pleasures and rejects the call to temperance.

especially during social gatherings , recreational activities , or times of celebration
gluttony.question: Did I overindulge in eating or drinking beyond what's reasonable, especially during social gatherings, recreational activities, or times of celebration?
gluttony.description: This sin of gluttony demonstrates an inordinate attachment to worldly pleasures and rejects the call to temperance.

extracted_data_phrases: in eating or drinking to an extent that compromised my physical and spiritual well - being
to an extent that compromised my physical and spiritual well - being
gluttony.question: Did I overindulge in eating or drinking to an extent that compromised my physical and spiritual well-being?
gluttony.description: This sin of gluttony demonstrates an inordinate attachment to worldly pleasures and rejects the call to temperance.

extracted_data_phrases: in wasteful gambling that takes precedence over my financial obligations , potentially harming my ability to provide for myself and those who depend on me
for myself and those who depend on me
prodigality.question: Have I excessively engaged in wasteful gambling that takes precedence over my financial obligations, potentially harming my ability to provide for myself and those who depend on me?
prodigality.description: This sin violates the virtue of stewardship by recklessly risking resources God has entrusted to us, while potentially harming our ability to provide for family and those in need.

gossip.question: Have I taken pleasure in discussing others' private affairs, even if what I shared was true?
gossip.description: Gossip violates human dignity and charity by harming others' reputations for our own entertainment or pride.

gossip.description: Gossip violates human dignity and charity by harming others' reputations for our own entertainment or pride.

gossip.question: Have I indulged in discussions that involved sharing others' personal affairs, even if they were true?
gossip.description: Gossip violates human dignity and charity by harming others' reputations for our own entertainment or pride.

impiety.question: Did I engage in work on a Sunday, contrary to what was necessary?
impiety.description: It's irreverent to work on a Sunday as it's a holy day of rest, worship, and a day of protest against the servitude of work and the worship of money (CCC).

impiety.question: Did I engage in work on a holy day, such as Sunday, unnecessarily?
impiety.description: It's irreverent to work on a Sunday as it's a holy day of rest, worship, and a day of protest against the servitude of work and the worship of money (CCC).

in my connections with loved ones
anger.question: Have I nursed anger rather than seeking reconciliation in my personal relationships, leading to damage in my connections with loved ones?
anger.description: Uncontrolled anger corrupts our own heart, damages our relationship with both God and neighbor.
